original_text: “‘If a woman approaches an animal to have sexual relations with it, kill both the woman and the animal. They are to be put to death; their blood will be on their own heads.
korean_text: 여자가 짐승에게 가까이 하여 교합하면 너는 여자와 짐승을 죽이되 그들을 반드시 죽일지니 그들의 피가 자기들에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: to have sexual relations with it
kill both the woman and the animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자와 동물을 둘 다 죽이라

sentences.original_text: They are to be put to death
their blood will be on their own heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 피는 그들 자신의 머리에 돌아갈 것이다
